Training

Online Qualitative Research Training

Upskill your team to conduct more insightful and profitable online qualitative research.

Course Modules

1

Win

Learn how to pitch and win online qualitative projects. Understand client needs and position your offering effectively.

2

Plan

Design effective online qualitative research projects. Choose the right methods and platforms for your objectives.

3

Run

Execute online qualitative projects with confidence. Master moderation techniques and participant engagement.

4

Psychology

Understand the psychology behind online behaviour. Apply behavioural science to improve research quality.

Interested in Training?

Get in touch to find out more about our training programmes.
